text: Ruffneck Peak () is in the Salmon River Range in the U.S. state of Idaho. The peak is located in Salmon-Challis National Forests. A historic fire lookout is on top of Ruffneck Peak. Constructed in 1932, the fire lookout is staffed seasonally. ==References== Category:Mountains of Custer County, Idaho Category:Mountains of Idaho
title: Ruffneck Peak
